pages.text: Maids can attack players, players' pets and even other maids by default. To change this behavior, you need a sasimono.

After crafting a sasimono, right-clicking a maid with it. You can change the pattern later in Maid GUI. $(br2) You can customize the pattern. Refer to $(l:https://github.com/TartaricAcid/TouhouLittleMaid/wiki/%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E6%97%97%E6%8C%87%E7%89%A9%E6%9D%90%E8%B4%A8%E8%AF%B4%E6%98%8E)the wiki$() for details about Sasimono customization.
